snippet: No. 3 Kentucky, which has struggled recently, took its first steps toward fulfilling preseason expectations, defeating Providence at Barclays Center.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Kentucky beats Providence, 79-65; other college basketball men's and women's news noted.
lead_paragraph: No. 3 Kentucky, which has struggled recently, took its first steps toward fulfilling preseason expectations, defeating Providence at Barclays Center.

headline.main: Young Kentucky Team Shows Progress in Brooklyn
